instruction:
Evaluate the quality of the following sentence:
"To get a better understanding of the material we have been studying, going through examples is a good choice."
output: The sentence is well-written and conveys the meaning clearly. The structure of the sentence is also grammatically correct and uses appropriate vocabulary. It is an effective way to communicate the idea that going through examples is a good way to gain a better understanding of the material. Overall, the sentence is of good quality.
